verses.verse: There was a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4321>Micah.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> "The eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> that were <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H422>you,<s%> about which you uttered a curse, and also <S%H559>spoke<s%> it in my <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H3701>behold,<s%> the silver is with <S%H3947>me;<s%> I took <S%H517>it.<s%>" His mother <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be my <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

He <S%H7725>restored<s%> the eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> to his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I most <S%H6942>certainly<s%> <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand<s%> for my <S%H1121>son,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> and a molten <S%H6459>image.<s%> Now therefore I will restore it to <S%H7725>you.<s%>"

When he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H6884>founder,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> of it an engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> and a molten <S%H4541>image:<s%> and it was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4321>Micah.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> who became his <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
There was a young <S%H5288>man<s%> out of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who was a <S%H3881>Levite;<s%> and he lived <S%H1481>there.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> out of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah,<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> where he could <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H935>place,<s%> and he came to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> as he <S%H6213>traveled.<s%>

<S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H370>him,<s%> "Where did you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H559>from?<s%>" He said to <S%H3881>him,<s%> "I am a Levite of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah,<s%> and I am <S%H4672>looking<s%> for a <S%H1980>place<s%> to <S%H1481>live.<s%>"

<S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3427>him,<s%> "Dwell with <S%H1>me,<s%> and be to me a father and a <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H6235>ten<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> per <S%H3117>year,<s%> a <S%H6187>suit<s%> of <S%H899>clothing,<s%> and your <S%H4241>food.<s%>" So the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> went <S%H3212>in.<s%>
The <S%H3881>Levite<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man;<s%> and the young <S%H376>man<s%> was to him as <S%H5288>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
<S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and the young <S%H5288>man<s%> became his <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>
Then <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now <S%H3045>know<s%> I that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will do <S%H3190>good<s%> to <S%H3881>me,<s%> since I have a Levite to my <S%H3548>priest.<s%>"
